info.name: brick hill new style on old layout (dark theme)
info.description:
What something brighter? Check out the light theme version: https://userstyles.org/styles/218409

WORKS BEST IF USING THE DARK MODE OPTION IN SETTINGS

This theme is meant to have the old 2017 and 2018 layout of brick hill using the new style.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1:
- Side ads are no longer shown due to errors with positioning. Rectangle and square ads are still shown because they do not cause problems with this theme
